title: Bernie's Button
summaries: Bernie's Button is a Hardmode, post-Plantera pet-summoning item that summons a Bernie pet to follow the player around. Bernie's Button can be purchased from the Princess for 25 GC.

statistics.Tooltip:
Summons a cherished teddy bear
'My childhood buddy - Bernie!'
statistics.Buy: 25 GC
statistics.Sell: 5 GC
